name: Sakura Succubus 9
storyline:
Reunite with your favorite succubi once again in Sakura Succubus 9, the continuation of the popular visual novel series.

Out of the blue, Ayu receives an invitation to perform in a joint concert with the legendary idol Mihama Shizuru. Shizuru was hugely successful almost a decade ago, but retired from the world of idols and now she's past her prime.

Shizuru has just turned forty, but she still boasts a rabid fanbase. Determined to capitalize on Shizuru's success and introduce her to a new generation of idol fans, Ayu's management contrives to have Ayu and Shizuru take to the stage together in Astoria.

The internet is soon awash with excitement, but Ayu is less than enthused. Stubborn and selfish, Ayu doesn't want to share the stage with anybody: least of all a washed-up has-been like Shizuru.

Hiroki accompanies Ayu to Astoria alongside Hifumi, Cosmos, and Alice in the hopes of cheering Ayu on, but he's starting to worry his efforts will be for nothing.

Will Ayu's concert with Shizuru be a success - and who's this mysterious woman Hiroki runs into who seems so interested in him?

Hiroki's life is only set to get harder, and Ayu isn't making things any easier!
summary: In the ninth part of the Sakura Succubus series, Hiroki returns to Astoria with Ayu as she prepares for the concert of a lifetime: a joint show with her fellow idol Mihama Shizuru. Will this concert end in success, and will Hiroki's harem get even bigger?
